ABOUT.TITLE: About Us
ABOUT.STORY_TEXT: The Gourmet Bistro was founded in 2015 with a simple mission: to create exceptional dining experiences using the finest locally-sourced ingredients. What started as a small family restaurant has grown into a beloved community gathering place, known for our innovative cuisine and warm hospitality.
ABOUT.MISSION_TEXT: We believe in the power of good food to bring people together. Our commitment is to serve dishes that not only delight the palate but also nourish the soul. Every ingredient is carefully selected, every dish thoughtfully prepared.
ABOUT.CHEF_BIO: With over 15 years of culinary experience across Europe and North America, Chef Maria brings her passion for Mediterranean and contemporary cuisine to The Gourmet Bistro. Her creative approach and dedication to quality have earned the restaurant numerous accolades.
ABOUT.AWARD2: Top 10 Bistros in Quebec 2019 - Food & Wine Magazine
ABOUT.AWARD3: Excellence in Service Award 2021 - Restaurant Association
